entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is the one who walked over to the sideboard and pulled out a bottle of firewhisky. He sent twelve full glasses soaring through the room with his wand.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is mentioned as someone who was toasted by everyone, including Harry and Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who echoed 'Mad-Eye' a little late with a hiccup.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is the one who drained his own glass in one and changed the atmosphere of the room.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as someone who disappeared, and there are suspicions that he might have betrayed them.

entities.name: firewhisky
entities.description: Firewhisky is the drink that was consumed by everyone in the room.

relationships.description: Bill sent twelve full glasses of firewhisky to each person, including Mad-Eye, and they all drank.
Hagrid echoed 'Mad-Eye' a little late with a hiccup.
Lupin's question about Mundungus disappearing changed the atmosphere of the room, and everyone was tense while waiting for his response.
